column1: Smoque BBQ////One of the best bbq places I have been.  The sliced brisket was moist and good portion.  The mac and cheese was good.  It has a crum topping and the is moist.  I wish there was more.  I also got a side of the chili it was nice not a lot of meat in it.  Definitely recommend the food here to anyone who likes bbq.  My kids got the ribs and they both it and ate it all.
